features: 【POWERFUL ANDROID TABLET】NOBKLEN kids tablet offers all the features needed for children learning & playing. This child-friendly Android device includes Google Kids Space pre-installed, free kids app in the kid's store, access to Google Play Store and NOBKLEN OS updated with security updates from Google. Plus parental controls keep your little ones safe online!

【Google Kids Space and Family Link 】NOBKLEN is a modern tablet designed for kids that focuses on creating a safe and secure children's entertainment environment. It includes security controls such as app restrictions and network filters; There are also many content management features such as parental control options, multimedia handling capabilities, behavioral restrictions like child locks, spending limits per app category or game time limits

【New Android 13.0 Kids Tablet】It offers an incredible tablet experience for kids. It features Android 13.0 operating system, 1280 x 800 IPS HD display, support for Wi-Fi, Bluetooth GPS and more! With 4GB RAM and 64GB ROM capacity available through microSD card extensions you'll be able to store all your favorite photos music videos without running out of space! Plus the wifi module is more stable giving you a better tablet experience.

【Kids Tablets With Handle Case Included】The Kid-Proof Case provides protection against scratches, dirt and bumps on your tablet device. This lightweight case is made of soft silicone material which ensures it won't weigh down your child's tablet. Plus it also serves as a stand so kids don't have to hold their devices when learning or playing games!

【BEST KID-FRIENDLY COMPANION]】The NOBKLEN Tablet is specially designed for kids ages 3+. Its interface makes it easy enough for young children to navigate through their own private playground full of educational and entertaining apps and websites without any undue risk. Kids can access digital content on the tablet with ease which helps them get ahead in school or learn new skills at home!

Featuring fast charging technology, this kids tablet can be fully charged in 1.5 hours when using the 5V 2A charger provided.

Why choose NOBKLEN Tablet? Still worried about picking a gift for your child? NOBKLEN KIDS TABLET is one of the best gift options for your child.NOBKLEN KIDS TABLET comes with Google Kids Space pre-installed, so parents can choose child mode and don't have to worry about unfriendly content on the Internet. NOBKLEN KIDS TABLET comes with a built-in quad-core processor and the latest Android 13.0 operating system, Type/USB C charging port for faster charging. 4GB of RAM is much faster than 2GB, HD 10-inch screen, Kid-Proof Case, 64GB of storage and dual cameras (Android 13 is more powerful, more energy efficient and faster than 12 and lower versions. faster.) It runs many learning game apps smoothly. Thousands of free kids apps to keep your child immersed, giving you time to tackle your own work and let your child learn while playing, while you can choose the time of day and time period to use the tablet in parent mode if you are worried about your child using the tablet for too long. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Secure Kidoz application makes it best fit for kids & tablet has most of latest components in tech!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I currently use an iPad and have been using it for many years. Have been away from android devices for many years and got this wallet-friendly device for rough use at home especially to play something (videos/games) for my kid and hand it over to him without worrying about it being expensive. My experience has been nice for now. This tablet has decent processing speed and does not hang while using it. I would recommend this tablet in the budget category as it offers enough for the price.My 2 cents below:Pros:- Apps & games: Has plenty of inbuilt games for kids covering fun and education learning both- Parental control: Kidoz app makes it easy to have parental control and it is very easy to use too- Display: 1280*800 HD 10.1 inches size is clear overall. I love how bright these are- Sound: It is loud enough for kid's usage- Processing power: It has a quad-core cortex A53 processor with 2 GB RAM and in my usage experience, I did not see any issue with the functionality. This tablet is decent fast and does most of the job without any lag- Inbuilt storage: Comes with 32GB ROM inbuilt and an external microSD slot makes it more adaptive to storage extension if needed- Battery life: 6000mAh and has very good battery backup. Not as good as my iPad but it lasted between 5-6 hours of usage with half of it playing games and the remaining web surfing- Looks and Design: Sleek design and looks elegant overall. Obviously not as premium as high-end tablets like iPad or Galaxy and has a plastic build but it is very thin and light for a long-usage tablet- Android version & the UI: Comes with the android 12 Go and kudos for that. Also, the user interface is simple and nice- WiFi + Bluetooth connectivity. It has all you would need in an electronic device at this price- Charging: It has a USB-C port and hence par as per the latest standard- Durability: The case makes it very sturdy, hence a safe tablet for kids' rough use. The case arm has a closed loop handle and hence kids can easily hang it in hand and walk- Price: Very reasonably priced considering the features- Warranty: The manufacturer provides 2 years of long warranty on this productCons:- I would recommend getting this tablet for photography as a primary need. The camera picture quality is not very appealing and not impressed by that- I wish some more case color options were available to choose from

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my 4 year old on his birthday. I was warned by another parent that she was no the happiest with this model. However I chose to give a shot just because opinions differ obviously. Once getting it I found it fairly easy to set up and make ready which I did later at night once my child was asleep for the night. The following couple of weeks I noticed he was struggling to use it and whatnot. Thinking it was his age I grabbed it for a few hours in which I noticed several problems. Most importantly was the 3 times in the few hours I spent with it the "UI" feature failed making me have to restart it in order to use it again. Second thing I noticed was how incredibly slow it was when it was actually operating. Load speed on this can take minutes just trying to do even the basic of things with it. I am not one to return many things I just learn and move along in life however I did return this within three weeks and requested my refund. Which of course Amazon did come thru on. Long story short I would find a better brand or model when obtaining a children's tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Empower Your Child's Learning Journey
reviews.reviewText: The Nobklen 10in Kids Tablet is a fantastic educational tool designed to engage young minds while providing a safe and entertaining learning experience. With its thoughtful features, age-appropriate content, and durable build, this tablet offers a gateway to endless educational opportunities for children. In this review, we'll explore the key features and benefits that make the Nobklen Kids Tablet a valuable investment for parents and caregivers.1. Child-Friendly Design:The Nobklen Kids Tablet boasts a child-friendly design that is both visually appealing and easy to hold. The 10-inch screen size strikes the right balance between portability and a comfortable viewing experience. The rounded edges and lightweight construction ensure a secure grip, reducing the chances of accidental drops. The tablet's vibrant colors and well-spaced buttons make it visually engaging and intuitive for young users.2. Robust Parental Controls:Parents can enjoy peace of mind knowing that the Nobklen Kids Tablet comes equipped with robust parental controls. The tablet offers customizable content settings, time limits, and access restrictions to ensure a safe and controlled digital environment for children. With these features, parents can effortlessly manage and monitor their child's screen time and select appropriate content aligned with their educational goals.3. Educational Content and Apps:The Nobklen Kids Tablet provides access to a wide range of age-appropriate educational content and applications. Pre-installed educational apps cover various subjects, including mathematics, science, languages, and creativity, stimulating the child's learning in an interactive and engaging manner. Additionally, the tablet allows the installation of additional educational apps and games, expanding the learning possibilities to cater to a child's specific interests and abilities.4. Durable and Childproof Build:Understanding that children can be quite active, the Nobklen Kids Tablet is designed to withstand the rigors of daily use. The tablet features a durable build with a protective bumper case that absorbs shocks and protects against accidental drops. The scratch-resistant screen ensures that the tablet remains in excellent condition even after repeated interactions, allowing children to explore and learn without concern for its safety.5. Long Battery Life and Storage Capacity:The Nobklen Kids Tablet offers extended battery life, allowing for uninterrupted learning sessions or entertainment on-the-go. With the tablet's generous storage capacity, children can download and store their favorite educational apps, ebooks, videos, and games. The expandable memory option further enhances the tablet's storage capabilities, ensuring ample space for your child's digital library.Conclusion:The Nobklen 10in Kids Tablet provides the perfect balance between entertainment and education, empowering children's learning journeys. With its child-friendly design, robust parental controls, access to educational content and apps, durable build, and long-lasting battery life, this tablet offers a safe and engaging platform for young minds to flourish. Invest in the Nobklen Kids Tablet and watch your child embrace the joy of exploring and discovering in an educational and entertaining way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I do like this tablet a lot for my girls, it was kind of confusing and really difficult when I had to do the setup. As it required a kids Gmail account or it would be just like a regular tablet. Plus it does lag a decent amount. But it does have a lot of storage, and is pretty kid friendly once set upSo I do like it a lot, and my girls do too.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice! Kids tablet
La puntualidad en la entrega fue genial llego antes de navidad

reviews.reviewText: Muy bonita, pero al usarla, es pésima, a 1 día de uso la tablet se trabo, la apagamos, y al momento de prenderla solo cargaba el inicio y se apagaba, cabe recalcar que la tablet tenía 78% de bateria, cuando prendio fue después de 2 horas (tiempo que dejamos de intentar encenderla) y cuando prendio todo lo tuve que volver a configurar como si fuera nueva, la verdad el precio no lo vale, está muy bonita, la verdad se ve super bonita pero es pésima para usarse. Por eso mejor la devuelvo. Tenía muchas espectativas en ella
Funcionó durante un mes pero ya no carga la pila y no lo puede usar mi hijo.
